subject: Dear friend ,
body:
Dear friend ,
I'm Mrs. Joanne Reyes, from Texas,
My brain tumor surgery is coming next week, these have
been confirmed by your doctor, please respond immediately because i
have a $ 12 million dollar inheritance donation for you ...
more details will be sent to you
joannereyes011@mail.com
Greetings
Mrs. Joanne Reyes,

subject: Re: Dear friend ,
body:
Hello Mrs. Joanne Reyes,

I'm sorry to hear about your health condition and I hope your surgery goes well. It's very kind of you to think of others during such a difficult time. 

You mentioned a donation, could you please provide more details about it? How did you come across my contact information?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
John
